DialogueTree.DisplayName: Guardian of Spawn Dialogue
DialogueTree.Description: Dialogue tree for Guardian of Spawn

Node.Text: [AI: Boss accepts challenge with intimidating response]
So, you wish to challenge me? Very well! I, Guardian of Spawn, guardian of Spawn, accept!
You've drawn first blood... Impressive! But this battle has only just begun!
Enough holding back! WITNESS MY TRUE POWER! I will defend Spawn with everything I have!
You're stronger than I thought... I must be more careful now!
*breathing heavily* I'm nearly finished... Will you show mercy, or end this?
[AI: Guardian of Spawn expresses gratitude/confusion at being spared, yields and offers weapon/gold]
[AI: Guardian of Spawn accepts fate with honor, makes desperate final attack]
You have... bested me... Spawn... is yours... You've earned it...
[AI: Boss protecting Spawn. Theme: Challenge, guardian, test of strength]
[AI: Guardian of Spawn responds warmly, mentions nearby locations: SpawnSpoke2Ring1, SpawnSpoke3Ring1]
[AI: Guardian of Spawn provides lore about Spawn]
[AI: Farewell message]

DialogueTree.DisplayName: Trader at Spawn Spoke 1 Ring 1 Dialogue
DialogueTree.Description: Dialogue tree for Trader at Spawn Spoke 1 Ring 1

Node.Text: [AI: Merchant welcomes customer and mentions their wares]

Choice.Text: Let me see your wares (open trade)

Node.Text: [AI: Merchant considers the request based on WillingToBargain trait]

Choice.Text: Ask for a big discount (requires BargainSkill 30+)
Ask for a modest discount (requires BargainSkill 15+)

Node.Text: [AI: Merchant impressed by negotiation skill, agrees to 30% discount]
[AI: Merchant insulted by lowball offer, becomes unfriendly]

Choice.Text: I apologize, can we try again?

Node.Text: [AI: Merchant agrees to reasonable 15% discount]
[AI: Merchant can only offer small 5% courtesy discount]
[AI: Merchant shows their wares]
[AI: Merchant at Spawn Spoke 1 Ring 1. Sells region-appropriate goods, shares rumors]
[AI: Trader at Spawn Spoke 1 Ring 1 responds warmly, mentions nearby locations: SpawnSpoke2Ring1, SpawnSpoke1Ring2]
[AI: Trader at Spawn Spoke 1 Ring 1 provides lore about Spawn Spoke 1 Ring 1]
